page.title: 12RECREATION & GAMES
page.content: Recreation - Games Bulldog 1.You need lots of people to play bulldog. 2.One person stands in the middle of where you are playing. The other people stand at one end together. 3.The person in the middle says a name like Clare so Clare has to run across without getting caught. If you do get caught the person in the middle says B.B.1.2.3.then you are caught and help to catch the others. 4.If you happen to get past the other people can run pass too. 5.When everyone is caught the second person who was caught is on. 6.German Bulldog is nearly the same except instead of people's names being called subjects are chosen instead.You run across when your subject is called.
